titles.title: I Will Rejoice In You And Be Glad

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Draw me after You and let us run together…{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is Jesus down in my heart, It is Jesus down in my heart, It is Jesus down in my heart, Jesus the King of Kings! O Hallelujah!{/lang-eng}
